DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate two different setting commercially available ankle foot brace affect stroke patient walk . The study brace ankle foot orthosis ( AFO ) make use new type joint contains soft insert , addition conventional hard stop , limit range motion ankle walk . The result study help clarify 1 ) whether new joint affect way walk , 2 ) whether make easy clinician align brace 3 ) opinion new joint .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Functional Walking Outcomes Two Settings Commercially Available AFO Adult Stroke Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate two different setting commercially available ankle foot brace affect stroke patient walk . The study brace ankle foot orthosis ( AFO ) make use new type joint contains soft insert , addition conventional hard stop , limit range motion ankle walk . Participants undergo test gaitlab use new brace period time . The result study help clarify 1 ) whether new joint affect way walk , 2 ) whether make easy clinician align brace 3 ) opinion new joint .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between age 21 70 male nonpregnant female 2 . Diagnosis stroke 1 year ago 3 . Ambulatory 0.5m/s great 4 . Require unilateral AFOs ambulate 5 . Stable medical condition concomitant progressive disease could affect motor function 6 . Ability comply direction cooperate research team 1 . Subjects currently receive physical therapy gait problem 2 . Anticipated surgical pharmacologic intervention tone/contractures study period 3 . Additional neurologic musculoskeletal diagnosis might impair gait ( i.e. , recent orthopedic intervention ( 6 week ) , unhealed fracture , significant degenerative joint disease , low limb amputation , uncontrolled seizure ) 4 . Recent cardiac active pulmonary disease , liable blood pressure 5 . Recent back surgery
